title: What is the scope of a fitness trainer course in India, and what are the best institutes to do it from? - Quora

response.answer_text: Now-a-days the scope of fitness trainer is not that much easy. after training and getting knowledge from the institutes they are not able to get such good jobs due to the less demand of trainers in INDIA. Trainers have to face lots of problems as of getting jobs. The pay scale of teachers today is very less if you belong to physical education field. this is because many people dont know the importance of gym and fitness. there are few colleges that can give good knowledge of gym trainers as well as instructor. there are few colleges 1.lakshmibi national college, 2.Indira Gandhi institute,Delhi
